sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>wolverine</radical> is going down a <radical>slide</radical> into your <radical>mouth</radical>. Why is he going into your mouth, though? You're opening it really wide, because you're screaming "<kanji>BUDDY</kanji>!!! You're so excited to see your wolverine buddy-pal again. You thought he was dead.
meaningInfo: Make sure you feel super happy. Even yell "Buddy" out loud while imagining this wolverine coming at you, if you're not in a quiet-zone.
readingMnemonic: As you're about to embrace your <kanji>buddy</kanji> wolverine, a rac<reading>coon</reading> (<ja>くん</ja>) tackles the wolverine off the slide, preventing your mouth embrace.
readingInfo: "RaCCOON!" you yell. "THIS IS NONE OF YOUR BUSINESS. Get out of here." Feel some hate for the raccoon. He ruined everything.
